SELECT sum( bank_money + online_money + hand_rech_money ) allRechAmount, count( DISTINCT account ) allRechCount, sum( bank_money ) bankMoney, sum( online_money ) onlineMoney, sum( hand_rech_money ) handMoney, sum( first_rech_money ) firstRechMoney, sum( CASE WHEN first_rech_money > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) firstRechCount, sum( bank_money + online_money + hand_rech_money - first_rech_money ) secondRechMoney, sum( bank_count + online_count + hand_rech_count - (CASE WHEN first_rech_money > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) secondRechCount, sum( exception_recharge_amount ) exceptionRechAmount, sum( virtual_recharge_money ) virtualRechMoney FROM member_rw_report
(bank_money > 0 or online_money > 0 or hand_rech_money > 0)

SELECT 'a' rechCode, count( DISTINCT account ) rechNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE bank_count > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'b' rechCode, count( DISTINCT account ) rechNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE online_count > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'c' rechCode, count( DISTINCT account ) rechNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE hand_rech_count > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'd' rechCode, count( DISTINCT account ) rechNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE virtual_recharge_number > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'e' rechCode, count( DISTINCT account ) rechNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE exception_recharge_amount > 0

SELECT sum( withdraw_money + hand_withdraw_money) allWithAmount, count( DISTINCT account ) allWithCount, sum( withdraw_money ) withdrawMoney, sum( hand_withdraw_money ) handWithdrawMoney, sum(counter_fee) counterFee, sum( first_withdraw_money ) firstWithMoney, sum( CASE WHEN first_withdraw_money > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) firstWithCount, sum( withdraw_money + hand_withdraw_money - first_withdraw_money ) secondWithMoney, sum( withdraw_count + hand_withdraw_count - (CASE WHEN first_withdraw_money > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) secondWithCount, sum(third_withdraw_money) thirdWithdrawMoney, sum(third_withdraw_count) thirdWithdrawCount, sum( exception_withdraw_amount ) exceptionWithdrawAmount, sum( virtual_withdraw_money ) virtualWithdrawMoney FROM member_rw_report
(withdraw_money>0 or hand_withdraw_money > 0)

SELECT 'a' withCode, count( DISTINCT account ) withNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE withdraw_count > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'b' withCode, count( DISTINCT account ) withNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE hand_withdraw_count > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'c' withCode, count( DISTINCT account ) withNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE exception_withdraw_amount > 0
UNION ALL SELECT 'd' withCode, count( DISTINCT account ) withNum FROM member_rw_report WHERE virtual_withdraw_number > 0

select game_type gameType, sum(bet_amount) betAmount, sum(valid_amount) validAmount, sum(win_amount) winAmount, sum(valid_amount+win_amount) payoutAmount, count(DISTINCT account) gameNum from game_bet_daily_report
GROUP BY game_type;

select game_type gameType, sum(real_rebate_money) waterAmount from game_rebate_report where status = 1
GROUP BY game_type

select account from game_bet_daily_report
GROUP BY account

SELECT ifnull(CONVERT(sum( rech_discount ),DECIMAL(22,2)),0) rechDiscount, ifnull(CONVERT(sum( other_discount ),DECIMAL(22,2)),0) otherDiscount FROM member_rw_report
(rech_discount > 0 or other_discount)
